messages.subject: Re: [AlwaysLearning] Shyrley!
messages.msgSnippet: Shyrley, That great! I m sure life will keep you busy enough to not think about the time going by. I know after we moved there was so much to decide on and
messages.messageBody:
Shyrley,
That great! I'm sure life will keep you busy enough to not think about
the time going by. I know after we moved there was so much to decide on and
arrange I didn't have time for much of anything else. All that excitement
and newness. Have you found a house yet? I think someone asked but I must
have missed the answer. I hope you have a *great* day. Tootles! :-)


Barb E
"Shared laughter is like family glue. It is the stuff of
family well-being and all-is-well thoughts. It brings us
together as few other things can."

-- Valerie Bell, author



>
> Not yet. She's due in 4 weeks or possibly sooner judging by the amount of
> contractions i'm getting!
>
> Shyrley

messages.subject: Re: [AlwaysLearning] Shyrley!

messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 1/19/2004 12:56:53 PM Pacific Standard Time,
homemama@... writes:

> Shyrley,
> So glad to see you here. I take it everything is going well. Did I miss
> you babys arrival?
>
>
> Barb E
>

Not yet. She's due in 4 weeks or possibly sooner judging by the amount of
contractions i'm getting!

Shyrley

messages.subject: [AlwaysLearning] Shyrley!
messages.msgSnippet: Shyrley, So glad to see you here. I take it everything is going well. Did I miss you babys arrival? Barb E Happiness is a butterfly, which, when pursued, is
messages.messageBody:
Shyrley,
So glad to see you here. I take it everything is going well. Did I miss
you babys arrival?


Barb E
"Happiness is a butterfly, which, when pursued, is always
just beyond your grasp, but which, if you will sit down
quietly, may alight upon you."

- Nathaniel Hawthorne, Author

messages.messageBody:
Earthmomma67@... wrote: Now is the time to take that long drive to my house.

I bin waiting for that invite, being the polite Brit that I am....and some directions....:-)

Shyrley

> Anyone else been through this? What did you do? And no, I can't drink or
> take Xanax as I'm pregnant!!
>
> Shyrley
>
>
>
Now is the time to take that long drive to my house!

*~*Elissa Jill*~*
unschooling Momma to 3 beautiful brilliant people
Loving partner for life to Joey
terrible guitarist, fair singer and happy woman.
